# nmfLabelTransfer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Spatial integration of cross-platform spatial transcriptomics data using two-stage label transferring.

## Installation

You can install the development version of nmfLabelTransfer from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cindyfang70/nmfLabelTransfer")
```
